= Electric Force and Electric Charge =

== TL;DR ==

* *Coulomb's Law*: $F = k_e\frac{qq'}{r^2}$
* *Permittivity constant*: $\epsilon_0 = 8.55 \times 10^{-12}~\mathrm{C^2 \cdot N^{-1} \cdot m^{-2}}$
* *Coulomb constant*: $k_e = \frac{1}{4\pi\epsilon_0} = 8.99 \times 10^9~\mathrm{N \cdot m^2 \cdot C^{-2}}$
* *Charge of proton*: $e = 1.60 \times 10^{-19}~\mathrm{C}$
* *Charge of electron*: $-e = -1.60 \times 10^{-19}~\mathrm{C}$
